mapper.select: SELECT mandalart_id AS mandalartId , a.parent_id AS parentId , a.title , a.contents , a.completed_fg AS completedFg , a.depth , a.start_date AS startDate , a.finish_date AS finishDate , a.order_id AS orderId FROM mandalart a WHERE a.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY a.depth , a.parent_id

SELECT COUNT(mandalart_id) AS cnt , A.project_id AS projectId, B.title , A.start_date AS startDate , A.finish_date AS finishDate FROM mandalart A JOIN project B ON A.project_id = B.project_id WHERE B.user_id = #{userId} AND DATEDIFF(finish_date , CURDATE()) <= 7 AND DATEDIFF(finish_date , CURDATE()) >= 0 GROUP BY A.project_id;
